sentences.en: A bullock is a castrated bull.
A lion was standing over a bullock.
sentences.cn: 狮子正在扑倒一条小牛.

sentences.en: Again he set up the one hundred heavily loaded bullock carts.
sentences.cn: 他又一次装好一百辆沉重的牛车.

sentences.en: And Governor Bullock never sets foot in this house again.
sentences.cn: 还有,无论如何不要再让布洛克州长进我家的家门了.

sentences.en: And they slew a bullock, and brought the child to Eli.
sentences.cn: 25宰了一只公牛, 就领孩子到以利面前.

sentences.en: He hung this around the mighty bullock's neck.
sentences.cn: 他把金币包挂在公牛的脖子上.

sentences.en: He put a bullock stopped the hillside, twigs spread son.
sentences.cn: 他把牛车停下, 砍了好多树枝子,就着山坡儿搭棚.

sentences.en: He was sweating like a bullock.
I will take no bullock out of thy house, nor he goats out of thy folds.
sentences.cn: 9我不从你家中取公牛, 也不从你圈内取山羊.

sentences.en: My cutting up bullock depended on heart, not on eyes.
sentences.cn: 我分解牛时不是靠眼睛而是靠心.

sentences.en: Sandra Bullock plays a successful businesswoman in the romantic comedy The Proposal.
sentences.cn: 珊卓.布拉克在浪漫喜剧《爱情限时签》中饰演事业成功的女强人.

sentences.en: Sandra Bullock was born in Washington D . C . on July 26, 1964.
sentences.cn: 桑德拉·布洛克于1964年7月26日出生在华盛顿.

sentences.en: The department does not take the task lightly, Bullock said.
sentences.cn: 布拉克表示,保安部门对这项工作相当重视.

sentences.en: The little boy lied on the bullock cart sleeping.
sentences.cn: 这个小男孩躺在牛车上睡着了.

sentences.en: They worked hard pulling ploughs in the fields and bullock carts on the roads.
sentences.cn: 而小牛犊们却得在田里辛苦地拉犁耕田劳作,还得驾驶牛车.

words.tran_cn: 看涨的；上扬的；似公牛的
